com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views

Class Hits

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
          • com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.Hits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild2, android.support.v4.view.ScrollingView, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, AlgoliaErrorListener, AlgoliaResultsListener, AlgoliaSearcherListener

    public class Hits
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
implements AlgoliaResultsListener, AlgoliaErrorListener, AlgoliaSearcherListener
    Displays your search results in a flexible way. Built over a RecyclerView, it displays a limited window into a large data set of search results.
